皇民化政策: (こうみんかせいさく) - imperialisation policy (esp. on Korea during Japan's colonial rule) (imperialization); policy of imperialisation
皇漢医学: (こうかんいがく) - traditional Chinese medicine
皇祖: (こうそ) - (divine, historical or legendary) founder of an empire
皇祖皇宗: (こうそこうそう) - ancestors of the Imperial Family
皇祚: (こうそ) - rank of emperor; the imperial throne
皇籍: (こうせき) - membership of the Imperial family
皇紀年度: (こうきねんど) - numbering of years since Jimmu
皇考: (こうこう) - the (deceased) father of the current emperor
皇親: (こうしん) - imperial family; relatives of the Emperor
皇道: (こうどう) - the benevolent Imperial rule; the Imperial Way
皇道派: (こうどうは) - Imperial Way Faction (of the Imperial Japanese Army)
皇霊: (こうれい) - spirits of past emperors
皇霊殿: (こうれいでん) - shrine of imperial ancestors
皇霊祭: (こうれいさい) - equinoctial ceremony held by the emperor at the shrine of imperial ancestors
皎々: (きょうきょう) - bright (esp. of the moon); (こうこう only) broad and empty
皎然: (こうぜん) - shining brightly; shining whitely
皎皎: (こうこう) - bright (esp. of the moon); (こうこう only) broad and empty
皐月: (さつき) - fifth month of the lunar calendar; (also written as 杜鵑花) satsuki azalea (Rhododendron indicum)
皐月晴れ: (さつきばれ) - early-summer fine weather (during rainy season)
皐月鱒: (サツキマス) - sea-run variety of red-spotted masu trout (subspecies of cherry salmon, Oncorhynchus masou ishikawae); red-spotted masu salmon
皓々: (こうこう) - bright (esp. of the moon); (こうこう only) broad and empty
皓然: (こうぜん) - shining brightly; shining whitely
皓皓: (こうこう) - bright (esp. of the moon); (こうこう only) broad and empty
皓礬: (こうばん) - zinc sulfate heptahydrate; white vitriol
皮: (oi/kawa) - skin , skin, hide, pelt, fur; rind, peel, husk, bark; shell, sheath, wrapping; mask (hiding one's true nature), seeming
皮ごと: (かわごと) - with the skin on; skin and all (fruit, potato, etc.)
皮ひも: (かわひも) - leather strap; thong; leash
皮をかぶる: (かわをかぶる) - to conceal one's true nature or feelings; to feign friendliness; to play the hypocrite
皮をはぐ: (かわをはぐ) - to skin; to peel
皮を剥く: (かわをむく) - to peel; to skin; to pare
皮を剥ぐ: (かわをはぐ) - to skin; to peel
皮を被る: (かわをかぶる) - to conceal one's true nature or feelings; to feign friendliness; to play the hypocrite
皮付き: (かわつき) - unskinned; unhusked; in the skin
皮作り: (かわづくり) - sashimi with skin still attached
皮剥: (カワハギ) - thread-sail filefish (Stephanolepis cirrhifer); skinning (an animal)/stripping (a tree of its bark)/barking/skinner/barker
皮剥ぎ: (カワハギ) - thread-sail filefish (Stephanolepis cirrhifer); skinning (an animal)/stripping (a tree of its bark)/barking/skinner/barker
皮癬: (ひぜん) - scabies; sarcoptic mange; the itch
皮相浅薄: (ひそうせんぱく) - (yoji) shallow and unwise; superficial and thoughtless
皮算用: (かわざんよう) - over-optimistic calculation; counting one's chickens before they're hatched
皮籠: (かわご) - baskets wrapped in paper, bark or skin
皮紐: (かわひも) - leather strap; thong; leash
皮肉: (hiniku) - ironia, sarcasmo, cinismo, sátira; inesperado, diferente do que se esperava, não como havia sido planejado; (apenas) superficial, algo superficial
皮肉る: (ひにくる) - to speak cynically or with sarcasm
皮肉屋: (ひにくや) - ironist; sarcastic person; sharp tongue; satirist
皮膚移植: (ひふいしょく) - skin graft; skin transplant
皮膚粘膜眼症候群: (ひふねんまくがんしょうこうぐん) - Stevens-Johnson syndrome
